name: Sweet Nightmares (MrScientist, Granieten)
description:
During your REM sleep, you dream the most. This is also the place where nightmares might occur. In this 2D defender game, you have to defend your sleeping player with the help of a fairy.

Nightmares can take different shapes for everyone. In this game they'll be the occasional flying eyeball or crawling hand. 

Enjoy!

Granieten & MrScientist

We used a one control modifier during the jam, restricting us to only use on button/control.

Controls:

Press "Space" to change direction.

Pickups:

 = Destruction wave clearing the field of enemies.

 = Extra Fairy for a limited time.

 = Multiplier of the score above.

= Speed amplifier, makes you go twice as fast.
